TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHierarchyData

summary.span: 公开分层数据结构的节点，包括节点对象和描述节点特征的一些属性。

span.span: Exposes a node of a hierarchical data structure, including the node object and some properties that describe characteristics of the node.

summary.span: 实现 接口的对象可以包含在 集合中，并由 ASP.NET 站点导航和数据源控件所使用。

span.span: Objects that implement the interface can be contained in collections, and are used by ASP.NET site navigation and data source controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口由类实现，表示节点的层次结构，并跟踪对其父节点和子节点的层次结构关系。The interface is implemented by classes that represent nodes of a hierarchical structure, and track the hierarchical relationships to their parent and child nodes. 类实现接口中实现的集合可包含接口。Classes that implement the interface can be contained in collections that implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现包装类接口对象。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the interface with a class that wraps a object. 类是个不错的分层数据节点，其中接口表示 ASP.NET 分层数据源控件。The class is a good example of a hierarchical data node, which the interface represents for ASP.NET hierarchical data source controls. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#5)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以递归方式循环访问集合，提取使用枚举器中的项方法，并执行具有数据项的基本工作。The following code example demonstrates how to recursively iterate through an collection, extract the item from the enumerator using the method, and perform basic work with the data item. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetChildren() cil managed

summary.span: 获取一个枚举对象，该对象表示当前分层节点的所有子节点。

span.span: Gets an enumeration object that represents all the child nodes of the current hierarchical node.

returns.span: 当前分层节点的子节点的 集合。

span.span: An collection of child nodes of the current hierarchical node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性来确定是否节点具有子节点。You can use the property to determine whether the node has child nodes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何检查属性来确定当前的分层数据节点是否具有子节点，然后检索这些使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to check the property to determine whether the current hierarchical data node has child nodes, and retrieve them using the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData GetParent() cil managed

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象表示当前分层节点的父节点。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the parent node of the current hierarchical node.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示当前分层节点的父节点。

span.span: An object that represents the parent node of the current hierarchical node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口无法定义 hasparent 简便属性，因此调用方必须检查的返回值方法`null`来确定是否当前节点是分层数据的根节点该节点所属的结构。The interface does not define a HasParent convenience property, so callers must check the return value of the method for `null` to determine whether the current node is the root node of the hierarchical data structure to which the node belongs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现中实现的类的方法接口。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class that implements the interface. `FileSystemHierarchyData`类包装对象，并方法的实现会检查的类型对象，并返回相应的父对象基于的类型。The `FileSystemHierarchyData` class wraps a object, and the method implementation checks the type of the object, and returns the appropriate parent object based on the type. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分接口和类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface and the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasChildren As Boolean
public: property bool HasChildren { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指示 对象所表示的分层数据节点是否有子节点。

span.span: Indicates whether the hierarchical data node that the object represents has any child nodes.

value.span: 如果当前节点具有子节点，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current node has child nodes; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是可使调用方以避免检查返回值的一个便捷属性方法`null`。The property is a convenience property that enables callers to avoid checking the return value of the method for `null`. 如果属性返回`true`，调用方法来检索子节点的集合。If the property returns `true`, call the method to retrieve an collection of child nodes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 分层数据绑定控件递归数据绑定方法中的对象。The following code example demonstrates how an ASP.NET hierarchical data-bound control uses an object in a recursive data-binding method. 中的项集合进行枚举，为每个使用检索对象方法。The items in an collection are enumerated, and for each an object is retrieved using the method. 最后，属性进行检查以确定是否要进行递归。Finally, the property is checked to determine whether to recurse. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Item As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Item { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 对象所表示的分层数据节点。

span.span: Gets the hierarchical data node that the object represents.

value.span: 一个 分层数据节点对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然很多表示分层数据节点，如类，请实现直接接口中，其他类只充当不实现接口的类的包装器。While many classes that represent hierarchical data nodes, such as the class, implement the interface directly, other classes only act as a wrapper for a class that does not implement the interface. 属性用于设计这些情况下，当业务对象在功能上等效于对象但不能轻松地重新设计。The property is provided for these design situations, when business objects are functionally equivalent to an object but cannot be redesigned easily. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性，请检查的类型对象使用属性，并强制转换对象以执行更多特定于类型的操作。The following code example demonstrates how to access properties, check the type of an object using the property, and cast the object to perform more type-specific operations. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Path As String
public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the hierarchical path of the node.

value.span: 一个 ，标识相对当前节点的分层路径。

span.span: A that identifies the hierarchical path relative to the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以传递给方法来检索对象标识的节点对应。The property can be passed to the method to retrieve the object that corresponds to the node identified by . > [!CAUTION] > 属性不应包含主机环境有关的任何敏感信息，因为它可能会呈现给数据绑定控件中的客户端。The property should not contain any sensitive information about the host environment, because it might be rendered to the client in a data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现中实现的类属性接口。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the interface. `FileSystemHierarchyData`类包装对象，和属性实现将返回其文件系统路径。The `FileSystemHierarchyData` class wraps a object, and the property implementation returns its file system path. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分接口和类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface and the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Type As String
public: property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含在 属性中的 的类型名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the type of contained in the property.

value.span: 对象表示的对象的类型的名称。

span.span: The name of the type of object that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不会返回中所表示的对象的对象。The property does not return the of the object represented in an object. 它将返回的数据绑定控件用于区分具有不同的可绑定属性层次结构中的项的名称。It returns a name used by data-bound controls to differentiate between items in a hierarchy that have different bindable properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写基本属性设置为流，然后检查的类型对象使用属性和强制转换对象以执行更多特定于类型的操作。The following code example demonstrates how to write the basic properties to an stream, then check the type of an object using the property and cast the object to perform more type-specific operations. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx.vb#2)]
